comment.author: 51039755@N05
comment._content: IWM Q 11147 At Sautrecourt, France on 10th August 1918 The link above takes you to the Museums Website where the image can be zoomed. On the zoomed image the whippets serial numbers are visible: The tank on the left is A312 and the tank on the right is A324, A312 was filmed being inspected by the King. The Mk V behind the King has is marked on the sponson with a 6 in a circle. On the other Mk V the top of a letter (a "D" on "B" is just visible above a mans head). The photo was taken during the same visit as: www.flickr.com/photos/nlscotland/4688617298/in/set-721576... Source: sites.google.com/site/landships/home/lists/whippets/whipp...
